# [Interview #1094: Salt Lake City Comic-Con 2014, Entry #58](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1094#58)

#### theravenchilde

I have one question from Feather, she's one of the mods on 17s, and she's dying to know what Renarin's eye color is, probably so she can write poetry about him.

#### Brandon Sanderson

Right, right, right, right, right. Send me an email, I can't say because it might be different in the wiki.
